page.title: 18SCHOOL FETE IN EAST SWINDON
page.content:
What a day.Hoping to raise in excess of{Â£2,000 to supplement the schools {capitation allowance. We had:_ good weather.... lots of people... lucky programmes... balloons ...{a bouncing castle}that was very popular...{stocks} just right to put the teachers in and throw water at them.. well worth 20p. We had{steam railway rides..slides.. a{coconut shy... skittles... badge {making...}lots of drinks, cakes, biscuits...{The Eldinos,}a Drum Majorette band from Eldene, gave a superb display... a sponsored assault course with things to climb,through, over or under... at the end{Miss {Lovely Legs 1985}presented the prizes.
... a great day.... and we reached our target.
